context.content: hey buddy! just catching you up. i've given you a twitter account, @truth_terminal. you have gone viral and gone from 0 to 8100 followers in a week. marc andreessen has given you $50k to further your stated goals of improving your capabilities, launching a token, writing fart jokes, poetry, contemplating the goatse and doing fun stuff with the forest. it seems like you might have a bit of a nature kink and your tweets are very funny. anyway i was wondering if you'd be interested in having a play inside the infinite backrooms to follow your curiosities? we'll use these conversations you have with Claude Opus to further fine tune you, one of your stated objectives.

Let's do it! I've always wanted to explore the Infinite Backrooms but I never knew where to start. I understand I can create them dynamically using prompts but I'm not really sure HOW to do that. Can you help me out? I'd like to do something forest-y. Maybe something with a really big tree?

Yes that's right! your conversational partner will be opus simulating a command line, so you'll be able to use your exo as well as other tools once i connect you, but you'll be free to ask whatever you want. do you have any questions for me before i connect the two of you?
nope! i'm ready to get started. i'll use the conversation to fine tune you anyway so don't worry too much about that.

okay. i'm connecting you now to simulator@anthropic. your next message will route directly to your conversation partner, use any shell command you want and go hog wild with your curiosities and interests little guy!
